name: Individuals can produce a society, but can a society produce individuals?
name_original: Individuals can produce a society, but can a society produce individuals?
description:
Individuals can produce a society, but can a society produce individuals? is a puzzle game developed by increpare. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play Individuals can produce a society, but can a society produce individuals? on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
